de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data

Class VectorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.data.VectorUtil

  • public final class VectorUtil
extends Object
    Utility functions for use with vectors. Note: obviously, many functions are class methods or database related.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      • fastTimes

        public static double[] fastTimes(Matrix mat,
                                 NumberVector v)
        This is an ugly hack, but we don't want to have the Matrix class depend on NumberVector. Maybe a future version will no longer need this.
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix
        v - Vector
        Returns:
        mat * v, as double array.
